body.p:
Joshua B. Bowles, Pres.
Charles Tilden, Cash.
BANK OF LOUISVILLE,
Louisville, Ky., 20 Aug 1861.
Hon B. Magoffin,
Governor etc;
Dear Sir,
The object of my letter is to apply for a commission as a notary public for Jefferson Co., that I may qualify as the authorized notary for the Bank of Louisville.
I beg to refer to J B Bowles Pres. as below.

Louisville August 1861
His Excellency
Gov B Magoffin
Dear Sir Mr. Morgan a clerk in our Bank for our convenience wishes to be appointed notary he is a gentleman and every trustworthy
Yours very Respectfully Joshua B Bowles

Jefferson Co
Notary
E.d. D. Morgan
